text: Şaban Yıldırım (born 25 January 1970) is a retired Turkish football defender and later manager. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Sakaryaspor footballers Category:Denizlispor footballers Category:Bursaspor footballers Category:Dardanelspor footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Turkish football managers Category:Sakaryaspor managers Category:Samsunspor managers Category:Sarıyer S.K. managers
title: Şaban Yıldırım
